Provides working with keyboard buttons.

Imports

../core/exceptions, ../core/enums

Types

ButtonObj = object
  case btn_type*: ButtonAction
  of ButtonText, ButtonCallback:
      text_label: string

  of ButtonLink:
      link_label: string
      link*: string

  of ButtonPay:
      pay_hash: string

  of ButtonApp:
      app_label: string
      app_hash: string
      app_id*, owner_id*: int

  of ButtonLocation:
      nil

  payload*: string
  color*: ButtonColor
